Name: Layers of the Earth: Lesson for Kids
Subject: ['dating', 'earthquakes', 'volcanic eruptions', 'science', 'seismology', 'geology', 'volcanology', 'society']
Description: Although the earth might look like a solid ball, it's actually made up of several layers. This lesson teaches you some cool facts about the layers of the earth. We'll start with the outer crust and dig deep down to the core, all while exploring the layers in between.
